text: Thüngen () is a market community in the Main-Spessart district in the Regierungsbezirk of Lower Franconia (Unterfranken) in Bavaria, Germany and a member of the Verwaltungsgemeinschaft (Administrative Community) of Zellingen. == Geography == === Location === Thüngen is in the Würzburg Region, 25 km north of Würzburg and 30 km west of Schweinfurt, in the north of the Main Triangle (Maindreieck) on the river Wern. The community has only the Gemarkung (traditional rural cadastral area) of Thüngen. == References == == Further reading == * Fritz Kugler: Thüngener Heimatbuch, Markt Thüngen 1988, keine ISBN * Hannskarl Frhr. von Thüngen: Das Haus Thüngen 788 - 1988. Geschichte eines fränkischen Adelsgeschlechts. Echter Verlag, Würzburg 1988, . Category:Main-Spessart
title: Thüngen
